amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: SEC.___.None of the funds made available by this Act may be used to implement, administer, or enforce any authority, in any preceding provision of this Act, to use funds for the purchase or hire of motor vehicles.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 26 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit the use of funds for the purchase or hire of motor vehicles.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Barrow (GA) amendment (A050) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Barrow (GA) amendment (A050) Failed by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A050) offered by Mr. Barrow (GA).
